page.title: 15EVENTS CALENDAR
page.content:
Within this area there seems to be a thriving local community which organises a wide variety of events.
The following is a list of the events over the past year. Summer: the jumble sale was held on March 1st in aid of a body scanner for Southampton Hospital. A Fun Day was held on March 12th. The Brasstracks was held on June 12th by the crossroads in Branches Lane.The Safari Supper was held on June 13th. The village fete was held on July 5th in Edward White's field.The dawn walk assembled at the carpark behind the village hall on July 20th. The treasure hunt was held on July 29th.The horticultural show was held on July 7th.
